title: Mexico national under-18 football team
text:
The Mexico national under-18 football team, is controlled by the <a href="Federaci%C3%B3n%20Mexicana%20de%20F%C3%BAtbol%20Asociaci%C3%B3n">Federación Mexicana de Fútbol Asociación</a> (Mexican Football Federation) and represents <a href="Mexico">Mexico</a> in international under-18 (under age 18) football competitions.
The Mexico national Under-18 football team serves as a transition for players between the <a href="Mexico%20national%20under-17%20football%20team">Mexico national under-17 football team</a> and the <a href="Mexico%20national%20under-20%20football%20team">Mexico national under-20 football team</a>.
Though the team does not compete in a World Cups, It competes in international tournaments and holds several domestic training camps throughout the year.
References.
http://miseleccion.mx/la-seleccion-nacional-de-mexico-sub18-inicio-concentracion/
